alert.note: Alert for Catoosa (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 1:58PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold affecting Catoosa County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on the U.S. Highway 41 or Nashville Street bridge. The flood water will expand to inundate the entire area under the bridge. Minor flooding of the natural floodplain will also occur upstream of the gage between Interstate 75 and U.S. Highway 41 or Nashville Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The creek is expected to fall to 4.9 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
